‚öôÔ∏è **Comparatives** are used to compare two elements.

üîπ **1. SUPERIORITY (more... than)**

üîπ **2. EQUALITY (as... as / as much/many... as)**

üîπ **3. INFERIORITY (less... than)**

‚û°Ô∏è menos + adjective/adverb + **QUE**
‚Ä¢ *Este coche es menos caro que aquel.*
